comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aylmer_Hunter-Weston "Lieutenant-General Sir Aylmer Gould Hunter-Weston KCB DSO GStJ (23 September 1864 – 18 March 1940) was a British Army general who served in World War I at Gallipoli and the Somme Offensive. He was also a Member of Parliament."

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for pointing us to fuller information for Hunter-Weston.  We'll include some of it next time we update the description.
